footer_disclaimer: Все права защищены, никаких гарантий. Инструменты DeFi не являются игрушками. Используйте на свой страх и риск.

landing.intro_title: Alchemix Self-Repaying Loans allow you to leverage a range of tokens without risk of liquidation.
landing.intro_subtitle_0: Borrow up to 50% of your deposited collateral
landing.intro_subtitle_1: Spend and save at the same time
landing.short_explainer: By borrowing a synthetic version of the asset you deposit you'll avoid the risk of liquidation. Defi innovation on a whole new level, Alchemix is the first same-asset loan product in DeFi.
landing.short_explainer_end: Using your collateral we earn yield on your behalf to pay off your loan automagically!
landing.path_subtitle: A multi-functional account for all your financial needs
landing.benefit_leverage_blurb: Keep exposure to important assets while making them work for you. Leverage more of your wealth (without risk of liquidation!) by borrowing a synthetic version of your collateral.
landing.benefit_range_blurb: Alchemix is opening doors to new collateral types. Leverage more of your wealth than ever before.
landing.benefit_liquidations_blurb: No matter what happens we'll never liquidate your deposit. You can choose to self-liquidate your own loan at your own discretion.
landing.benefit_flexible_blurb: Alchemix doesn't lock your deposit or charge you fees. Your funds are accessible 100% of the time. You can also repay your debt whenever you like.

governance_page.title: Руководство
governance_page.subtitle: Предложения по улучшению Alchemix
governance_page.noOpenVotes: На данный момент открытых предложений нет.
governance_page.noTranslation: Результаты получаются через внешние API и не переводятся с их оригинального языка.

farm_page.title: Фермы
farm_page.subtitle: Получайте доход от своих вкладов
farm_page.saddle_text: Deposit alUSD, FEI, FRAX, and/or LUSD to earn ALCX, TRIBE, FXS and LQTY
farm_page.sushi_text: Deposit alUSD and ETH on Sushiswap to earn SUSHI

transmuter_page.title: Трансмутер
transmuter_page.subtitle: Конвертируйте свои синтетические токены в их аналоги в соотношении 1: 1

vaults_page.title: Своды
vaults_page.subtitle: Внесите залог и сразу же займите будущую доходность

galcx.title: gALCX Wrapper
galcx.leading: A liquid ALCX wrapper for single-sided staking.
galcx.p_1: Wrap your ALCX into gALCX and have your ALCX work for you in the single sided staking pool while staying in control of your gALCX.
galcx.p_2: Autocompounding increases the amount of ALCX you can unwrap per gALCX.

migration.title: Legacy Migration
migration.liq_explain: First step is to liquidate your outstanding debt, if applicable.
migration.wit_explain: Second step withdraws your entire balance from V1.
migration.mig_explain: Third step flashloans your new balance into a deposit with 50% LTV ratio.
migration.paragraph_1: To make it as simple as possible to migrate your Legacy vault deposits into V2, Alchemix is providing a migration tool which enables you to transfer your position into V2 while staying as gas-cost efficient as possible.
migration.paragraph_2: Your wallet will prompt you a few times to sign transactions that take care of the following steps:
migration.no_position: No legacy positions detected, you're all good!
migration.cus_explain: Choose an amount that you want to flashloan into a new V2 position, as well as the desired LTV amount which is used to determine how much debt to take up with each debt token mint.
